> ⚠️ **Unstable**: This @std package is experimental and its API may change without a major version bump.

## Overview

<p>Utilities for interacting with the
<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WebGPU_API" rel="nofollow">WebGPU API</a>.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { createTextureWithData } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/webgpu"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">const</span> adapter <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> navigator.<span class="pl-c1">gpu</span>.<span class="pl-en">requestAdapter</span>();
<span class="pl-k">const</span> device <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> adapter?.<span class="pl-en">requestDevice</span>()<span class="pl-c1">!</span>;

<span class="pl-en">createTextureWithData</span>(device, {
  <span class="pl-c1">format</span>: <span class="pl-s">"bgra8unorm-srgb"</span>,
  <span class="pl-c1">size</span>: {
    <span class="pl-c1">width</span>: <span class="pl-c1">3</span>,
    <span class="pl-c1">height</span>: <span class="pl-c1">2</span>,
  },
  <span class="pl-c1">usage</span>: <span class="pl-smi">GPUTextureUsage</span>.<span class="pl-c1">COPY_SRC</span>,
}, <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">Uint8Array</span>([<span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">1</span>]));
</code></pre>
